attributes.action: re nationalise all service industries such as, gas, electricity and water
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: the huge profits these industries are making should be going into the chancellors kitty for the good of all not just a few shareholders

rejection.details:
There is a very similar petition here:
http://petitions.pm.gov.uk/Re-nationalise/
If you wish to launch your own petition, please resubmit.
reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
